tool.name: XChem pose scoring
tool.command: ln -s '$receptor' receptor.pdb && base=\$PWD && cd /train/fragalysis_test_files/ && python '$__tool_directory__/xchem_deep_score.py' -i \$base/ligands.sdf -r \$base/receptor.pdb -w /tmp && cp /tmp/output.sdf $output

param.name: receptor
param.label: Receptor
param.help: Select a receptor (pdb or mol2 format).

param.name: mock
param.label: Mock calculations
param.help: Use random numbers instead of running on GPU

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This tool performs scoring of docked ligand poses using deep learning. It uses the gnina and libmolgrid toolkits to perform the scoring to generate a prediction for how good the pose is.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
1. The protein receptor to dock into as a file in PDB or Mol2 format. 2. A set of ligand poses to score in SDF format.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
An SDF file is produced as output. The binding affinity scores are contained within the SDF file as the XChemDeepScore property. Values range from 0 (poor affinity) to 1 (high affinity).
